<span style="display: none;">v3.19.2</span><table class="report" border="0" cellspacing="2" id="idp6632196368">
<tr>
<th class="tl" colspan="1" rowspan="2"><div style="width: 200px;"><strong>Derivative Instruments<br></strong></div></th>
<th class="th" colspan="1">3 Months Ended</th>
</tr>
<tr><th class="th"><div>Jul. 31, 2019</div></th></tr>
<tr class="re">
<td class="pl " style="border-bottom: 0px;" valign="top"><a class="a" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="top.Show.showAR( this, 'defref_us-gaap_DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgingActivitiesDisclosureTextBlock', window );">Derivative Instruments [Text Block]</a></td>
<td class="text"><table style="border: 0px solid black; border-image: none; width: 100%; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: 'times new roman'; font-size: 10pt; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; orphans: 2; widows: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left"><b>Note 5</b></td>
<td align="left" width="90%"><b><u>Derivative Instruments</u></b></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%">&#160;</td>
</tr>
<tr valign="bottom">
<td align="left"></td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify">In the normal course of business, the Company is exposed to fluctuations in the exchange rates associated with foreign currencies. The Company&#8217;s primary objective for holding derivative financial instruments is to manage foreign currency exchange rate risk.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%"></td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify"><u>Foreign Currency Exchange Rate Risk</u></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%"></td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left"></td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify">A majority of the Company&#8217;s revenue activities are transacted in U.S. dollars. However, the Company is exposed to foreign currency exchange rate risk, inherent in conducting business globally in multiple currencies, primarily from its business operations in Canada.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%"></td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left"></td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify">The Company&#8217;s foreign currency risk management program includes entering into foreign currency derivatives at various times to mitigate the currency exchange rate risk on Canadian dollar denominated cash flows. These foreign currency forward and option contracts are considered non-designated derivative instruments and are not used for trading or speculative purposes. The changes in fair value and settlements are recorded in change in fair value of derivative instruments, net in the consolidated statement of operations.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%"></td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left"></td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify">During the three months ended July 31, 2019 and 2018, the Company did not enter into any designated cash flow hedge contracts.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>&#160;</td>
<td width="90%"></td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td align="left"></td>
<td align="left" width="90%">
<p align="justify">The following table summarizes the notional amounts of the Company&#8217;s outstanding derivative instruments:</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<div>&#160;</div>
<table style="border: 0px solid black; border-image: none; width: 100%; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: 'times new roman'; font-size: 10pt; word-spacing: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; orphans: 2; widows: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr valign="top">
<td width="10%">&#160;</td>
<td align="left">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="11%"><b>July 31,</b></td>
<td align="center" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="11%"><b>April 30,</b></td>
<td align="left" width="1%">&#160;</td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td width="10%">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" style="border-bottom: #000000 1px solid;"><b>Fair value of Undesignated Derivatives</b></td>
<td align="left" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" style="border-bottom: #000000 1px solid;">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="11%" style="border-bottom: #000000 1px solid;"><b>2019</b></td>
<td align="center" width="1%">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="1%" style="border-bottom: #000000 1px solid;">&#160;</td>
<td align="center" width="11%" style="border-bottom: #000000 1px solid;"><b>2019</b></td>
<td align="left" width="1%">&#160;</td>
</tr>
<tr valign="top">
<td width="10%">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" bgcolor="#e6efff">Foreign currency option contracts</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" bgcolor="#e6efff">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" bgcolor="#e6efff">$</td>
<td align="right" width="11%" bgcolor="#e6efff">&#160;1,400,000</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" bgcolor="#e6efff">&#160;</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" bgcolor="#e6efff">$</td>
<td align="right" width="11%" bgcolor="#e6efff">&#160;1,500,000</td>
<td align="left" width="1%" bgcolor="#e6efff">&#160;</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p align="justify" style="color: #000000; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: 'times new roman'; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 65px; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal;">The following tables present the fair values of the Company&#8217;s derivative instruments on a gross basis as reflected on the Company&#8217;s consolidated balance sheets.</p>

<div style="display: none;"><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="authRefData" style="display: none;" id="defref_us-gaap_DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgingActivitiesDisclosureTextBlock">
<tr><td class="hide"><a style="color: white;" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="top.Show.hideAR();">X</a></td></tr>
<tr><td><div class="body" style="padding: 2px;">
<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="top.Show.toggleNext( this );">- Definition</a><div><p>The entire disclosure for derivative instruments and hedging activities including, but not limited to, risk management strategies, non-hedging derivative instruments, assets, liabilities, revenue and expenses, and methodologies and assumptions used in determining the amounts.</p></div>
